meta_description: The University of Wyoming Art Museum collects and showcases world-class art from artists all over the world. A major resource for UW, the museum is a place for learning and creative exploration. Click to learn more!
hours_text:
# Visit the University of Wyoming

## Find Your Place at UW

Visiting campus is the best way to picture yourself at the University of Wyoming. Whether you join us for an in-person tour, a drop-in visit, or a virtual experience, you'll get a real feel for student life. Explore our residence halls, connect with current students and meet with [admissions representatives](/admissions/counselors/index.html) who can answer all your questions. Plus, discover Laramie—a lively, welcoming college town in the heart of the Mountain West. Start planning your visit today and take the first step toward your future as a Cowboy!

[Schedule a Visit](/admissions/visit/weekday-visits/index.html)

admission_text:
# University of Wyoming Admissions

The University of Wyoming welcomes students to experience a one-of-a-kind education in the heart of the Mountain West. With our dedication to academic excellence and student-focused education, UW provides an environment where students can thrive both academically and personally. Admission to the University of Wyoming is just the first step to achieving your dreams.

[ Visit UW ](/admissions/visit/index.html)[ Request Info ](/admissions/request-information/index.html)

[Apply Today](/admissions/apply.html)

Get started on your path to the University of Wyoming!

accessibility_text:
# Accessibility Resources

Discover the University of Wyoming Human Resources’ Accessibility Resources page which provides guidance on ADA compliance, building and parking access, employee and student accommodations, assistive technologies, service animals, technology purchasing policies, and contact information for the ADA Coordinator and HR ADA Specialist.

If you are having difficulty accessing information on this page, please call (307) 766-4357 or email the IT Help Desk at [userhelp@uwyo.edu](mailto:userhelp@uwyo.edu).

Navigation [ Main Page ](/hr)

collections_text:
### Ann Simpson Artmobile

The Ann Simpson Artmobile is the mobile version of the University of Wyoming Art Museum, bringing art directly to communities across the state. This traveling museum offers a unique opportunity for people of all ages to engage with diverse exhibitions, educational programs and hands-on art experiences. By taking art, culture and history beyond the museum walls, the Artmobile plays a vital role in extending UWAM’s mission to connect with the broader Wyoming community. Whether visiting schools, libraries or community centers, the Artmobile ensures that access to the arts remains accessible, inspiring creativity and fostering a deeper appreciation for visual culture throughout the state.

[LEARN MORE ABOUT THE ANN SIMPSON ARTMOBILE](/artmuseum/education/ann-simpson-artmobile/index.html)
